main event: A fireball with a tall, bead-like string was seen shortly after 0100 PST on January 5, 1952 in Watsonville, California.
interesting points: The object was observed at an approximate altitude of 1000 feet.
The object was also seen and filmed in Grass Field, Gonzales and Hollister, California.
The object had an elongated, arrow-shaped form with a fuzzy, indistinct outline.
No other details about the object's movement or appearance are provided.
The report includes a newspaper article and a photograph of the blurred object.
sighted object: an elongated, arrow-shaped fireball with a tall, bead-like string
location: Watsonville, California; Grass Field, Gonzales and Hollister, California
